survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Autonomous Airport Baggage Drop Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used autonomous baggage drop systems at airports to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using the autonomous baggage drop system?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using the autonomous baggage drop system?

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for using the autonomous baggage drop system?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button with an open-text option (SINGLE_CHOICE with optional OPEN_TEXT)

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for using the autonomous baggage drop system?

questions.question_text: How easy was it to use the autonomous baggage drop system?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure ease of use. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How easy was it to use the autonomous baggage drop system?

questions.question_text: Did you encounter any issues while using the autonomous baggage drop system? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback on issues faced.

script.question_text: Did you encounter any issues while using the autonomous baggage drop system? If yes, please describe.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use the autonomous baggage drop system again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of future use. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use the autonomous baggage drop system again in the future?
